flow.descriptionCdata:
3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.060cbb2a-7bc3-4588-bbf4-8081568dea22.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.0a64a0a4-2130-4745-8e55-7e80349f717b.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.0e506e34-5646-4f49-b5e4-048c5fa6caa1.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.17ff4e63-91f8-4c31-9541-2a95e45fb649.prompt=Enter a value for proxy 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.1bcfdb34-defe-4a05-bb55-ce90a68d5887.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.1d0da884-6c06-4184-9301-57e86697220f.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.1f81a9d2-f815-495b-b4c9-175ddd21b49c.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.20800dce-8265-47cd-adf7-3467e530bc12.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.260e0161-ad06-4333-93eb-518f37d820e0.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.2e22bd0b-6450-46c3-b491-3da7bd82020b.prompt=Enter a value for keystore 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.307ecacd-5b69-4cca-b239-993badb6f8a5.prompt=Process Instance ID 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.33305e6a-e1c5-4605-ac1d-f951e53c134e.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.338df7da-627b-49e0-a090-6ebbdbc9fe35.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.3daafdbc-ed97-4555-9df0-c18c12cff56c.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.3e1e7fa1-fc40-4764-a605-31a6e39231dd.prompt=Desired memory size (in MB)\: 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.415e4fdb-276a-49ef-95c1-d58ef0ccef83.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.427b728c-fb9b-4c87-a5b5-b4bf0b590cf8.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.44b7f842-8e4f-46c7-90e5-897cf00f0bac.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.47326ab9-3d80-4be8-bf56-940016e9e109.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.479c68c9-d24d-4770-bf15-01b8c2e6334a.prompt=User Identifier 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.552d2f05-e301-445b-8a5f-44bec9b02076.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API

Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.968d5765-4dea-4cc3-90fe-ed507fb81dfa.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.a02dc263-c937-48af-8a29-d20e0c5abeff.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.a41282a8-5432-4f84-8eea-7d563f4668c9.prompt=Artifact ID 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.a4b055b8-7854-4577-920f-3b8fda1d3f58.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.aa33c9b0-fd4b-463f-8e7d-8755d0872d54.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.af7c6121-2e57-44ea-9870-fa9b4696e1f0.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.b24327ab-5966-4639-aea9-2552d0c514b3.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.b495f90e-7de5-48a4-b079-7ba0531e2c63.prompt=Enter a value for authType 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.bae445fe-47c2-4a6b-8579-eb39cff88db6.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.bd3c92ee-1619-4255-a660-d7186aadce34.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.bdb39c50-4317-4223-9be1-d31995de76cd.prompt=Resource Provider ID 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.c3540276-6916-4511-9038-73198053c44f.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.c3c10909-5fd3-4b8f-8aca-825de531b3d2.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.c3cfe28f-1f69-402e-9b48-7e000fd43937.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.c58bc2c5-1d10-4774-92fd-cedf74356ce3.prompt=Enter a value for authType 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.ce8c8033-e52c-4aa6-b644-7f0ff53b9616.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.ce8cd823-1647-4634-9018-a90dac312bed.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.ce97eaba-9765-438d-b2a7-47aa403b338b.description=
This workflow returns the details of the given artifact id.

Inputs-
artifactId –   Artifact  Id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
name –  name of the artifactr 
displayName – display name of the artifact
artifactType – Artifact type
state – state of the artifact
lifeCycleState –  life cycle state of the artifact
lifeCycleSubState – life cycle sub state of the artifact
document  – returned XML document from API
3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.d833e2ff-07cc-417f-876c-f481309f82e6.prompt=Enter a value for keystore 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.d83507ec-059d-4096-bef9-582956e5a811.prompt=Process Instance ID 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.dc674721-4c35-4516-94fc-c34effed53f3.prompt=Enter a value for timeout 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.description=
This flow will flex up or flex down the memory configuration of all the servers in a server group. The user is expected to enter the memory in MB that the servers should have. The flow will then apply this input as the final state of the memory for all the servers in the server group. If the memory of the server is less than the user input, then the server memory will be flexed up to the input. If the memory is lesser, then the server memory will be flexed down to the input. No changes will be made if the input and the current configuration are the same.

The flex up and flex down operations will execute whether the server is running, suspended or in switched off state.
If the flex up or flex down operation fails for one server, the action will continue on the remaining servers in the server group.
The maximum number that can be given as input for a flex up operation depends on the underlying configured vCenter.

Inputs\:
MEMORY_IN_MB	\: The memory in megabytes that the server should be set to.
CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success		\: The flex up/flex down operation succeeded on all servers of the server group
failure		\: The flex up/flex down operation may have failed on one or more servers of the server group
3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.e02bd2a9-75a1-480f-a0de-e550d61ebf46.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.ef266d61-448a-454c-b66f-730a0d009916.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.f3842dcf-cc5b-4cd8-b3af-f364fac7777f.prompt=Artifact ID 3937dc6d-637c-4cfc-ad26-84a6bfea34b5.fe0e175e-1620-4bf0-9806-c071ec9a4242.prompt=Enter a value for timeout
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute Linux - Server Group Flex Memory

staticBinding.value: Flex Memory action failed for one or more servers in server group
Status has changed on your subscription - ${subscriptionName}
Invalid input. Memory size should be in multiples of 4
Flex Memory action succeeded for all servers in server group
Updating the memory configuration on all the servers in the server group

scriptlet.name: Step Requested memory divisible by 4? in Flow vCenter Simple Compute Linux - Server Group Flex Memory (af7c6121-2e57-44ea-9870-fa9b4696e1f0)
